publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: tiger

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: crave; seek for; sometimes close to: ask for (something negative or neutral in meaning); try to find

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: all the; the various

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: generally: four-legged animal of a certain size which are liable to run away when hunted; 百獸"all manner of wild animals"; NB: one may also rear wild animals in parks 養獸

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: and at the same time, and on that occasion

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: feed on, eat (of animals); live on

tls:text.tls:line: 'The tiger hunts all the animals of the forest and devours them,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: but once when he caught a fox,

sense.def: manage to detain

tls:text.tls:line: but once when he caught a fox,

sense.def: fox

tls:text.tls:line: the fox said,

sense.def: fox

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: you, sir; you, madam

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: (GENERALLY probitive) should not in general; should never; should never again

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: presume; venture, have the audacity to (do something in front of a superior); make bold to; take the liberty of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: eat; eat some of; eat up; feed on; live on

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: sentence final particle in imperative sentences

tls:text.tls:line: "You dare not eat me.

sense.def: me (non-contrastive)

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: the Lord of Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: ensure that someone does something> order someone to do something; dispatch someone to do something

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: me (non-contrastive)

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: be the senior of> to govern (over somebody); to be the leader (of somebody)

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: all the; the various

tls:text.tls:line: The Lord of Heaven ordained me chief among beasts;

sense.def: generally: four-legged animal of a certain size which are liable to run away when hunted; 百獸"all manner of wild animals"; NB: one may also rear wild animals in parks 養獸

tls:text.tls:line: if you now kill me

sense.def: now if for example; suppose

tls:text.tls:line: if you now kill me

sense.def: you, sir; you, madam

tls:text.tls:line: you will be disobeying the will of Heaven.

sense.def: this would mean, that V

tls:text.tls:line: you will be disobeying the will of Heaven.

sense.def: oppose, go against; disobey (orders)

tls:text.tls:line: you will be disobeying the will of Heaven.

sense.def: [issued] by the Lord of Heaven; of the Lord of Heaven

tls:text.tls:line: you will be disobeying the will of Heaven.

sense.def: royal or imperial order, something that is by the higher order (from somebody)

tls:text.tls:line: you will be disobeying the will of Heaven.

sense.def: marks a judgmenal non-narrative verbal sentence; in later prose sometimes emphatic, especially in the construction 是...也.

tls:text.tls:line: If you doubt it,

sense.def: think that the N Vs; consider that S;

tls:text.tls:line: If you doubt it,

sense.def: 以N為V: regard N as V-ing; believe that N V-s 以汝為死

tls:text.tls:line: If you doubt it,

sense.def: faithless; untrustworthy
I (unmarked, non-contrastive, weak)
acting for > for something; on someone's behalf; in someone's favour; for the sake of
ahead, as first, in front
walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along

tls:text.tls:line: follow behind me through the forest

sense.def: ensue; follow behind (rather than go in front); trail behind and follow

tls:text.tls:line: follow behind me through the forest

sense.def: behind N

tls:text.tls:line: follow behind me through the forest

sense.def: my

seg.line: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: observe whether S; investigate how S;

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: 如嬰兒之未孩 "the NP-X that VP-Ys"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: how could you/I/one venture to V?

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: run away, flee; leave quickly[CHECK YOUR LEX ATTRIB][CA]

tls:text.tls:srcline: 觀百獸之見我而敢不走乎？』
tls:text.tls:line: and watch the animals flee when they see me."

sense.def: final question particle after verbal sentence 管仲儉乎？"Was Guǎnzhòng stingy?"

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger did indeed doubt the fox

sense.def: take it to be the case that S(often in polite speech:) to think (rightly, as in HF 7.2.3) that, to believe that 臣以為，甚以為不然; be convinced that, feel that

tls:text.tls:line: The tiger did indeed doubt the fox

sense.def: the contextually determinate S is true; it is so (mostly, the word in this meaning is used pro-sententially, as a pro-sentence)

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore followed him.

sense.def: therefore, consequently

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore followed him.

sense.def: N thereupon V-ed

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore followed him.

sense.def: jointly with (a list of people)

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore followed him.

sense.def: 與之俱 "be together with him"

tls:text.tls:line: and therefore followed him.

sense.def: walk, take a walk; travel; be on the move; go on a tour of inspection; walk along

tls:text.tls:line: Animals saw them and fled,

sense.def: generally: four-legged animal of a certain size which are liable to run away when hunted; 百獸"all manner of wild animals"; NB: one may also rear wild animals in parks 養獸

tls:text.tls:line: Animals saw them and fled,

sense.def: perceive visually; witness, come across; lay one's eyes on; focus and perceive properly; come across; notice; visualise intellectually; occasionally: imagine, have a vision of (ghosts)

tls:text.tls:line: Animals saw them and fled,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: Animals saw them and fled,

sense.def: everyone; anyone; all of them (quantifies then) (The manifest verbal derivation is from "be together", hence this is not construed as an nadV.)

tls:text.tls:line: Animals saw them and fled,

sense.def: run away, flee; leave quickly[CHECK YOUR LEX ATTRIB][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: be aware that S

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: stand in fear of; fear, be very much afraid of and at the same time in awe of

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: him/her/them (referring to highest subject in the sentence)

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: and 任重而道遠"his burden is heavy and the way is far"

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: run away, flee; leave quickly[CHECK YOUR LEX ATTRIB][CA]

tls:text.tls:line: but the tiger did not know that the animals ran because they feared him.

sense.def: marker of a conclusion of a narrative.

tls:text.tls:line: He thought they were afraid of the fox.

sense.def: take it wrongly to be the case that; wrongly imagine

tls:text.tls:line: He thought they were afraid of the fox.

sense.def: stand in fear of; fear, be very much afraid of and at the same time in awe of

tls:text.tls:line: He thought they were afraid of the fox.

sense.def: marker of a conclusion of a narrative.
